statements: DELETE FROM social_media_analytics WHERE likes > 100 AND platform = 'Twitter';
DELETE FROM social_media_analytics WHERE platform = 'Twitter' AND likes > 100 AND comments <= 50;
DELETE FROM social_media_users WHERE user_id = 123 AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM post_analytics WHERE user_id = 456 AND post_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE likes > 100 AND comments < 50;
DELETE FROM user_analytics WHERE total_posts = 0 OR total_likes < 100;
DELETE FROM engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 500 AND likes > 100;
